General.Name: Sahara Energy Ltd
General.Description: Sahara Energy Ltd., a junior resource exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of petroleum and natural gas reserves in Western Canada. The company focuses on the evaluation, exploration, and development of various oil and gas properties located in Saskatchewan and Alberta. It also invests in two real estate development projects in the United States. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada. Sahara Energy Ltd. is a subsidiary of JF Investment (Hong Kong) Co., Limited.
General.Address: 444 7th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 0X8
